@MrsRoadshow Re: Differing game preferences. Yes, big challenge for #innovation games, b/c you want diverse problem-solving styles #innochat
@thenerdyteacher [missing part] Re: game-based education. Many great discussions + examples at @Edutopia
A3) + love the @YCombinator has "changed the rules" so you just need a great team to play (no product or biz idea needed)  #innochat

@lindanaiman Re: game-based education. Many great discussions + examples at @Edutopia  #innochat
@Renee_Hopkins Examples: A public business model design game ...  http://t.co/qBSXI8m8 <= Planning a series for fall  #innochat
@Renee_Hopkins It's also different dynamic when you play alone or in a team.  #innochat
@bpluskowski In a well-designed game, you can pile the complexity and ambiguity on fast and deep  #innochat
@bpluskowski Re: introducing complexity gradually in game. Not necessarily. Appetite for complexity in competitive game is high. #innochat
@ValaAfshar Re: Best ideas winning. Depends on game design. If driving rigorous critique, may be idea that was "best defended"  #innochat
@bpluskowski Re: everything is a game. Need to create a game version of tweetchat where I can award points or blow up tweets  #innochat
@ValaAfshar re: lots of ideas. Variety too. In games you can push players away from cliched / hackneyed solutions.  #innochat
@ValaAfshar re: lots of ideas. Yes! And in a game you can overcome "idea infatuation" + drive players to keep exploring.  #innochat
@Renee_Hopkins Re: psychology + engagement. Breaking games into tiny components without a narrative or meta-game undermines both #innochat
For me the interesting question is how can we take #innovation games to the next level (+ that's the core focus of my work) #innochat
#innovation games aren't new ( @DaveGray + @SunniBrown claim Gamestorming contains game from past 40 yrs ) #innochat
A1) [cont.] + I avoid term "gamification" b/c "non-game contexts" is often in def. + I think ideation is a "game context"  #innochat
A1) I avoid the word b/c it's become too associated with overzealous game disassembly / cannibalization [cont.]  #innochat
